game.beginning: In the realm of Eridoria, where ancient magic and technology coexist in an uneasy alliance, the land is plagued by a mysterious force known as 'The Devouring.'
game.ending: The fate of Eridoria rests on the player's shoulders as they must face off against the true mastermind behind the chaos: the enigmatic figure known only as 'The Architect.'
game.synopsis: In the game, players take on the role of an ancient being reincarnated in a new body with no memories of their past. As they journey across Eridoria, they will uncover clues about their own identity and the cause of The Devouring.
game.title: Echoes of Eternity
